    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String alias)
        Creates Equinox user.
        Parameters:
        alias - User alias. This is the OS user account name.

    • Method Detail

      • getAlias

        public java.lang.String getAlias()
        Returns user alias. This is the OS user account name.
        Returns:
        User alias.

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Returns username. This will be the same as user alias if the user is not a registered user.
        Returns:
        Username.

      • getPermissions

        public java.util.List<equinoxServer.remote.data.Permission> getPermissions()
        Returns permissions of this client.
        Returns:
        Permissions of this client.

      • isAdministrator

        public boolean isAdministrator()
        Returns true if this user is an administrator.
        Returns:
        True if this user is an administrator.

      • isLoggedAsAdministrator

        public boolean isLoggedAsAdministrator()
        Returns true if this user is logged in as administrator.
        Returns:
        True if this user is logged in as administrator.

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(equinoxServer.remote.data.Permission permission,
                             boolean showWarning,
                             MainScreen mainScreen)
        Returns true if this client has given permission.
        Parameters:
        permission - Permission to check.
        showWarning - True if warning message should be shown in case the user doesn't have the given permission.
        mainScreen - The owner main screen. Null can be given if no warning message is needed.
        Returns:
        True if this client has given permission.

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Sets username.
        Parameters:
        username - Username.

      • setAsAdministrator

        public void setAsAdministrator(boolean isAdministrator)
        Sets this user as administrator.
        Parameters:
        isAdministrator - True to set this user as administrator.

      • loginAsAdministrator

        public void loginAsAdministrator()
        Sets this user logged in as administrator.

      • logoutAsAdministrator

        public void logoutAsAdministrator()
        Sets this user logged out as administrator.

      • addPermission

        public boolean addPermission(java.lang.String permissionName)
        Adds given permission to list of permissions.
        Parameters:
        permissionName - Name of permission to add.
        Returns:
        If the permission is added.
